article.headline: IUPUI 70, Centenary 68
article.story: SHREVEPORT, La. (AP) -- Austin Montgomery scored 25 points, including a put back with 1.6 second left, to propel IUPUI past Centenary 70-68 in a Mid-Continent Conference game on Thursday. Craig Swoope and Angelo Smith each scored 11 for IUPUI (9-10, 3-3), which shot 46.9 percent from the field compared to 46.2 percent for Centenary. Montgomery put IUPUI up 66-54 with a 15-foot jumper with 3:09 left, but Centenary scored the next nine points, taking advantage of three IUPUI turnovers and a pair of missed free throws to pull within 66-63. Gary Patterson pushed the lead back to 68-63 at the free throw line with 56 seconds left, but Centenary's Tyrone Hamilton answered with a three at the other end 11 seconds later. On the next inbounds past, Patterson turned the ball over, leading to a Hamilton layup to tie the score with 34 seconds left. Patterson then drove the lane but his shot came off the backboard, right to Montgomery, who grabbed it and dropped it in for the game-winner. Four Centenary players scored in double figures. Alexander Starr paced the Gents (7-14, 1-5) with 17 points, while Hamilton had 15, Nick Stallings scored 13 and Larry Logan added 12. IUPUI led at the half 29-23. IUPUI's bench outscored Centenary's reserves 11-5 and the Jaguars had more second-chance points, 16-4. But Centenary recorded more points off turnovers, 19-6, and more points in the paint, 34-18.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
